ResourceEntity.Name: Gold
ResourceEntity.Description: A highly desired and precious metal.

ResourceEntity.Name: Whales
ResourceEntity.Description: Huge sea creatures with a lot of meat and fat.

ResourceEntity.Name: Iron
ResourceEntity.Description: A common metal used to manufacture weapons and tools.

ResourceEntity.Name: Wheat
ResourceEntity.Description: A common and reliable source of food

ResourceEntity.Name: Grapes
ResourceEntity.Description: A valuable resource used to produce wine.

ResourceEntity.Name: Slaves
ResourceEntity.Description: A valuable living resource used to provide labor.

ResourceEntity.Name: Horses
ResourceEntity.Description: A valuable living resource used in many fields, including battles.

ResourceEntity.Name: Wild Animals
ResourceEntity.Description: A living resource that provides furs and valuable meat.

ResourceEntity.Name: Camels
ResourceEntity.Description: A valuable living resource used in many fields.

ResourceEntity.Name: Fish
ResourceEntity.Description: A common food source for coastal settlements.

ResourceEntity.Name: Pearls
ResourceEntity.Description: A valuable resource desired by the nobility.

ResourceEntity.Name: Timber
ResourceEntity.Description: Strong and high quality wood providing a very good and reliable building material.
